release.action: Added signum to Fraction and BigFraction.
Prevent random failure of micro-sphere test case.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The main changes are the addition of a field version of Vector2D, addition of an Optimum.of() factory method and a visibility change of the AbstractEvaluation constructor.
release.action: Add Optimum.of(...).
Make AbstractEvaluation constructor public, fix javadoc.
Fixed missing safety check in multi-step integrators. Github: fixes #62.
Added field version of Vector2D.
Prevent stack overflow error when attempting integration with too large number of points.
Show full precision in exception message when root bracketing fails.
When exception message formatting fails still show a helpful message and stack trace.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The main changes since last version are the introduction of field versions of bilinear interpolation, univariate interpolators, polynomials and polynomial spline functions, and the introduction of reset events in ODE.
release.action: Nullify corrected state after predict in abstract Kalman filter. Note that this affects only custom extensions of AbstractKalmanFilter because the implementations provided by Hipparchus (LinearKalmanFilter and ExtendedKalmanFilter) always call correction step after having called prediction step, so the nullified corrected state is reset properly at the end. This was initially reported as https://gitlab.orekit.org/orekit/orekit/issues/540.
Added FieldBivariateFunction and make both BilinearInterpolatingFunction and PiecewiseBicubicSplineInterpolatingFunction implement it. Github: fixes #55.
Added FieldUnivariateInterpolator and make both LinearInterpolator, AkimaSplineInterpolator and SplineInterpolator implement it.
Added FieldPolynomialFunction and FieldPolynomialSplineFunction.
Avoid too many multi-step integrator restarts after event resetting derivatives. Github: fixes #54.

Add Action.RESET_EVENTS to ask the integrator to recheck all event detectors without recomputing the step. Use when the g function of one event detector depends on events occurring in another event detector.
Fixed documentation for interpolation algorithms. Github: fixes #53.
Fixed lines/polyhedrons intersection occurring on facets boundaries. This was ported from Apache Commons Geometry issue 38.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The main changes since last version are the introduction of bilinear interpolation for 2D grids, field versions of sinCos and a way to build three-dimensional field arrays, accessors for state transition matrix, Jacobian matrix H, innovation covariance matrix and Kalman gain in Kalman filters, support for complex ordinary differential equations (both primary and secondary equations), and various fixes in partitioning.
release.action: Added bilinear interpolation for 2D grids. Github: fixes #48.
Added field version of sinCos. Github: fixes #47.
Fixed 2D outline extraction from 3D polyhedrons sets with holes. GitHub: fixes #45.
Added support for complex ordinary differential equations (both primary and secondary equations). Github: fixes #39.
Fixed wrong construction of an Illinois solver that really built a Pegasus solver. Github: fixes #44.
Renamed scale parameter to location parameter in the log-normal distribution, to avoid confusion. Github: fixes #4.
Added accessors for state transition matrix, Jacobian matrix H, innovation covariance matrix and Kalman gain in Kalman filters. GitHub: fixes #43.
Use topological information from BSP tree to connect more reliably edges and vertices when building the boundary loops of SphericalPolygonsSet. GitHub: fixes #42.
Forbid use of unrealistic tolerances (below ulp(2Ï€)) in spherical geometry. GitHub: fixes #42.
Fixed a corner case in BSPTree split. GitHub: fixes #41.
Bisection solvers failed to raise an exception when the search interval did not bracket a root. GitHub: fixes #40.
Added a way to build three-dimensional field arrays.

release.description: This is a maintenance release. The main changes since last version are the introduction of complex eigen decomposition, introduction of a solver for continuous time algebraic Riccati equation, a new Kalman module featuring both a filter for linear processes and a filter for non-linear processes, capability for secondary equations to update the derivatives of the primary equation in ODE, and introduction of a matrix decomposer to configure decomposition threshold independently of the matrix.
release.action: Added in FastMath the methods Java 9 added in StrictMath. This ensures FastMath is always a drop-in replacement for Math/StrictMath. Github: fixes #36.
Added FieldUnivariateVectorFunction and FieldUnivariateMatrixFunction interfaces, as well as RealFieldUnivariateVectorFunction and RealFieldUnivariateMatrixFunction Github: fixes #35.
Added FieldUnivariateFunction interface and have polynomials implement it. Github: fixes #34.
Added new utility methods to create real and field vectors from dimension.
Allow FastMath to operate on RealFieldElements. This simplifies a lot "fieldification" of algorithms previously implemented with primitive double numbers.
Added a transposeMultiply method to compute A^T.B without creating the intermediate transposed matrix.
Added a multiplyTransposed method to compute A.B^T without creating the intermediate transposed matrix.
Added linear and extended Kalman filters, with support for outliers rejection.
Added MatrixDecomposer interface that encapsulates algorithms tolerances.
Added a way to compute both sin and cos at once faster than performing two calls. This also speeds up DerivativeStructure.sin and DerivativeStructure.cos.
Allow secondary equations to update derivatives of primary equation in ODE. GitHub: fixes #31.
Fixed a problem with eigen decomposition of matrices with large coefficients. Github: fixes #30.
Added a solver for Continuous time Algebraic Riccati Equation.
Added complex eigen decomposition.

Corrected MannWhitneyTest to report the U statistic used in the test and improved accuracy of the reported p-values by 1) adding an implementation of exact computation for small sample sizes 2) applying continuity correction to the normal approximation when this is used 3) adjusting variance for the presence of ties in the data. The problem with the U statistic was reported against Apache Commons Math as MATH-1453.

Corrected WilcoxonSignedRankTest to discard tied pairs and to correctly perform continuity correction when estimating p-values using the normal approximation. This was reported against Apache Commons Math as MATH-1233.
Added new RealFieldElement implementations computing a tuple. This allow to perform the same computation on several values at once. The getReal() value correspond to the first component of the tuple.
Added a method to compute the orientation of a triplet of points in 2D.

Fixed an error in EmpiricalDistribution causing cumulative probabilities to be returned as NaN when some data bins are empty. This was reported against Apache Commons Math as MATH-1431. Github: fixes #25.
Added bracketing helper methods in UnivariateSolverUtils for RealFieldUnivariateFunction. Github: fixes #24.
Added a getBRep method to PolyhedronsSet to extract a Boundary REPresentation in regular cases (unbounded PolyhedronsSet or PolyhedronsSet with holes in their boundary are not supported).
Fixed NullPointerException when computing size of unbounded polygons sets.
Improved performance of getRow and setRow for Array2DRowRealMatrix and Array2DRowFieldMatrix. Github: fixes #22.
Fixed polygons creation from lists of vertices (both in Euclidean and spherical geometry) when separate edges share the same hyperplane (line or circle) but with different orientations.
Core: Added support for sampling from enumerated distributions in RandomDataGenerator. GitHub: fixes issue #19.
Core: Added support for exact integration in PolynomialFunction. GitHub: fixes issue #18.
Added a factory to simplify building DerivativeStructure instances.
Core: Added proper implementations of equals and hashCode to Fields so they can be used as keys in maps.
Core: Added a derivatives method in Hermite interpolator, similar to the one from FieldHermiteInterpolator.
Core: Added field-based derivative structures.
Core: Added field-based QR decomposition. GitHub: fixes issue #17.
Core: Performance improvement for Array2DRowRealMatrix.getSubMatrix() (and also Array2DRowFieldMatrix.getSubMatrix()). GitHub: fixes issue #12.
Core: Improved parameter validation for probabilities provided to enumerated distribution constructors.
Core: Added methods to expose the probability mass function to EnumeratedRealDistribution and EnumeratedIntegerDistribution.

Stat: Fixed overly-aggressive sufficient data check in OLS/GLS regression classes. When there is no intercept in the model, the number of observations can equal the number of regressors. GitHub: fixes #13.
Stat: Fixed bug in 2-sided binomial test leading to inflated p-values in some cases. This was reported against Commons Math as MATH-1381.
Stat: Add implementation of RANDOM algorithm for streaming percentile computation.
Stat: Add default "toString()" implementation to "AbstractStorelessUnivariateStatistic".
Stat: "StorelessUnivariateStatistic", "DescriptiveStatistics" and "StreamingStatistics" now extend from "DoubleConsumer", allowing to easily use them within streams.
Ode: Fixed Field ODE integrators handling of secondary equations. GitHub: fixes #7.
Geometry: Fixed numerical noise issues in Welzl smallest enclosing ball computation. Thanks to jerdmanGH for reporting the issue. GitHub: fixes #20.
Geometry: Added field based 3D lines.
Geometry: Added utility methods for field-based rotations and 3D vectors.

release.description: This is the first release of the library
release.action: Creation of a migration module and an associated script to help switching from Apache Commons Math to Hipparchus.
Simplified exception hierarchy.

Modularized the library into several components (hipparchus-core, hipparchus-clustering, hipparchus-fft, hipparchus-fitting, hipparchus-genetics, hipparchus-geometry, hipparchus-geometry, hipparchus-ode, hipparchus-optim, hipparchus-samples, hipparchus-stat).
Forked from the Apache Commons Math library.
